author: Bryan Pizzuti
comment: One thing this desperately needs is a way to set up a custom shortcut widget. Otherwise I do love the style.
title: Good but not perfect

author: Luis Cruz
comment: Right on my wrist, thanks to this watch face! Great support, too!
title: Everything I need...

author: Socrati Dinho
comment: Gorgeous

author: Joseph Loria
comment: This one manages to pack an incredible number of options and display items without veering into the tacky. Stunning.
title: Stellar

author: Timothy King
comment: Weather seems a bit glitchy...
title: Nice watch face but....

author: Russian Bot
comment: The customization options are amazing. Developer's watches have the best second time zone implementation. Watch itself is attractive, and easy to read. Love this!
title: Wow! Just awesome!

author: Thiago Almeida
comment: Falta opção para remover os ponteiros no modo ambiente.

author: Jonathan Whittle
comment: What's not to like
title: Great

author: Dean Bentley
comment: Really good.
title: Great

author: Scott Coffman
comment: This is my favorite watch face by far. It's very customizable as there are very many options and color configurations to choose from.  I'm able to choose high contrasting styles so that my middle-aged eyes can see the info on the face well. Looks great on my LG Urbane. Kudos to the developer for all the effort he put its in designing nice watch faces.
title: Love this watch face!

author: Hector Garza
comment: Very professional look, love the customization options, many backgrounds available and accent colors. Must have!
title: So many options

author: Oben Dag
comment: It us really customizable but it would be a good idea to have save option for user configuration!
title: Great watch face

author: Matt Conway
comment: Great design options. Great battery life for all of the features. Interactive widgets, fantastic!
title: Love it!

author: Miljenko Ugarkovic
comment: Where are the presets?
title: Presets!

author: Christopher Mortlock
comment: By far one of favorite yet!

author: Santiago Garcia
comment: It's missing ambient color options
title: It's great but missing ambient color option

author: Tom Erdely
comment: Took me a while to figure out that you need to use your phone to configure it, but the watch face is great. Good looking and interactive.
title: Great watch face

author: Cody Schadegg
comment: Wonderful face, one of my daily users! The other is a Thema face too.
title: Awesome faces!

author: james dean
comment: I keep downloading this person's watch faces and am loving every one of them. Like the customization. Would be nice if I could save watch preferences that I customise so I don't have to redo it each time I want to change my theme. Will keep buying more of your faces when they come out. They are perfect.
title: Best faces on the market

author: Jose Hernandez
comment: 1) be able to add/open any custom application installed in wear to the widgets (i.e. wear messenger - like the mini wear watchface does) and 2) have a few more additional options to adjust the widget wheels spacing (the push back option has too much spacing and without it they get too tight and too close to the center).
title: Two requests to make this 5 stars!

author: Hui Chen
comment: highly flexible, good balance with number of customization options, a good look
title: Great Value, Versatile

author: Imad Al Habib
comment: It's the most amazing watch Face I've ever seen
title: Amazing

author: John Biddlestone
comment: Really like this face

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. The 12/24hr format is already available. Just take a look in the watch face settings on your mobile (in the Android Wear app). Its is located in the "General" tab.

title: Great face

author: edwin sosasscdf
comment: I like the watch face but the step widget does not work always at 0 very disappointed and I can't even get my money back any more

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Steps are related to Google Fit only. In settings of the watch face on your MOBILE, did you approve the request to access the fitness data? Can you try install Google Fit app and see if it shows the steps count? You will need to activate history in it (like all google fit users do, on the first screen). EDIT: Did it solve your issue?

title: Nice app

author: Brent Cameron
comment: I would give this 5 stars but have one issue.  I would like interactive widgets but without them switching data.  For  example,  when touching the weather widget I want more weather info I do not want it to change to other data widgets.  Same goes for Gmail and sms.  Similar to what you can do with your  Driver watchface.  Also would like to save profiles so I can have a variety of custom colors depending on what I wear.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Done concerning the interactivity :) Update will be available soon!

author: Mohamed Allie
comment: Awesome

author: Larry Matter
comment: My current favorite face, it has lots of options setting in Android wear app (with preview).  Nicely done dev!
title: Lots of options!

author: Dmitry Glozman
comment: I can't find a way to modify watch functions other than color. No phone app, only within the watch itself, but you can only modify the color. That's it. LG G R watch

reply.author: thema
reply.content: The Watch Face settings can be found in the "Android Wear" application. Just touch the gear icon over the watch face preview, all settings are located here. Send me an email if you still did not found them.

title: Works fine now. Thank you for the comments!

author: Dominic Zarelli
comment: Very customizable. Lots of colors to pick from. Good stuff!
title: Love it

author: Jason Platt
comment: Looks great and the customization options are fantastic. I did just notice that the date does not show on the square watch face, and the step counter doesn't work. One star removed.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi
Can you send me a picture of the date problem? I will be glad to try to solve it!

title: Amazing

author: Roschmann Godinho
comment: Must have face. Would be cool if you could remove the white border while in ambient noise though as I think it's unnecessary.
title: Nice!

author: Robert Nazarian
comment: Very nice looking with many options. The only problem is the text in the dials is too small. They are unreadable.
title: Pretty good

author: James Blackmon
comment: Live having all those options at my disposal.
title: Awesome display

author: T J
comment: If u can make it where u can change always on screen color it would be perfect it will help with oled screens
title: Oled screen
